source.7d92ea47:
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.bc41d2e4:
f = 1000
t = np.arange(0,2e-3,10e-6)
b = np.sin(2*np.pi*f*t)
plt.figure(1)
plt.plot(t,b,"g")
plt.xlabel('t');
plt.ylabel('x(t)');
plt.title("Continuous Signal")
plt.show()
source.20af70a0:
ts = np.arange(0,2e-3,0.1e-3)
c = np.sin(2*np.pi*f*ts)
plt.figure(2)
plt.stem(ts,c,"k")
plt.xlabel('n');
plt.ylabel('x(n)');
plt.title("Discrete Signal")
plt.show()
